fullText: This production cuts right to the emotional heart of Stephen Sondheim's masterpiece, with Patti LuPone and Michael Cerveris delivering performances that are both intimate and terrifying.
dtliExcerpt: This production cuts right to the emotional heart of Stephen Sondheim's masterpiece, with Patti LuPone and Michael Cerveris delivering performances that are both intimate and terrifying.
bwwExcerpt: Many Broadway revivals of musicals from decades past insist on revising, reconsidering and imposing. Thomas Kail’s triumphant revival of “Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street” does none of that. At once funny, scary and disarmingly moving, this must-see production is content to peel back a...
